basics.name: Jim Park
basics.label: Senior Infrastructure Engineer
basics.summary: My focus has been, from the very start, the enablement of others in pure pursuit of their passion. This is my passion.

work.summary: We are transforming the way we write software, so that we can change the way the world reads.

work.position: Member of the Technical Staff - Head of Operations
work.summary: DevOps at a bank. Our lab had a machine learning focus, and a real entrepreneurial spirit. We broke established patterns by building it all in modern, effective ways (GCP GKE, CI/CD top to bottom, Lean). We wrote new rules to satisfy our real needs as part of a trusted financial institution. We inspired a bunch of people along the way.
highlights: Easy SSO using Google Cloud Identity.
Push to deploy all the things.

work.summary: Technical leader in Pivotal Web Services Cloud Operations team
highlights: Built the first self-running, self-repairing, self-updating Cloud Foundry Platform as a Service.
How do you run 50,000 containers in production? Automation. Lots of automation. And YAML. Lots of YAML.

work.summary: I wrote Chef cookbooks. I did not like it.
Traditional datacenter based systems administration as a main, with a serving of puppet on the side, and classic Perl and Ruby scripting as dessert.
highlights: 1000+ servers running puppet for the first time isn't so scary if you properly collect the data.

work.summary: The best, hardest entry level systems administrator job I've had. I learned so much about HA configurations, networking fundamentals, and systems administration at Peer 1. I think about my learnings at this job whenever I fire up tcpdump.
Systems Administrator with a heart of gold images.
highlights: I can't believe you think I'm going to setup 100 workstations and not install a Norton Ghost server in a VM.

work.position: Sergeant - Ground Electronics Telecommunications and Information Technology Systems Maintainer
highlights: In OIF, reduced MTTR for field hardware from months to same day or next day for a majority of common repairs by modifying shop procedures and implementing a parts cache.

volunteer.summary: Social Mobility Pathways matches mentors with junior professionals and students. Mentors receive leadership training, and mentees are given guidance and structures for fulfilling on their life's purpose.
Toastmasters International is a nonprofit educational organization that operates clubs for the purpose of promoting communication, public speaking, and leadership skills.
